title: Mathews top in ICC Rankings for ODI all-rounders
content: Sri Lankan skipper Angelo Mathews is now the No 1 all-rounder in the International Cricket Council’s (ICC) Rankings for One-Day International (ODI) All-rounders. Despite Sri Lanka losing the ODI series to India 0-5, Mathews was one of the success stories and performed brilliantly with the bat. In the last ODI at Ranchi, he smashed 139…
